name: Billie's Soap & Spa Products
overview:
Billie’s Soap & Spa Products is an all-natural soap and personal care products company located in Grand Forks, North Dakota.

All products are made from original recipes written by co-owner Billie Leigh Kellar. Products include a unique body scrub, 12 different specialty bar soaps (Herbal Shampoo Bar, Lavender Vanilla Cream Facial Bar, Kitchen & Garden Bar, etc.), a whipped shea body butter, an herbal lotion, a laundry soap, and several different kids products. All products are completely petroleum and paraben free. Billie’s caters to the need for unscented/allergy-free products on both a custom/individual basis as well as with a general unscented/allergy-free line.

Products are sold wholesale through approximately 15 companies in North Dakota and Minnesota. Products are sold in-person at the Town Square Farmer’s Market, at all of the Pride of Dakota Holiday Showcases, and at many small craft and other shows.

Business has expanded dramatically with the addition of a patent-pending new product line (Turbo & Shea Scrub) and funding is being sourced for attendance at larger trade shows, website/online expansion, and a possible retail store location.
